Articles.Content: Coming soon. Very, very soon.

Today...

Wut?

Oh is that merch? Are there plushies?...
This was posted on Facebook and Twitter yesterday, but what could it be...?
Yeah, you replied right when I edited my post.

toys?

ACTION FIGURES!!!
oooh... this could cause problems if it's an update. ZS has a major release pack coming in two days...
It's the 29th now(everywhere I think)
Confused and annoyed since its today and WHAT IS IT I MUST KNOW

oooh... this could cause problems if it's an update. ZS has a major release pack coming in two days...

Most likely not an update, they will probably release .23 around December 12-13 closer to Kerbalcon.

I'm currently murdering the refresh button on the merch site/ Shapeways.

ok...it's 11 a.m.

what is this ?
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/ according to theis, at the time of posting, everywhere is eother ifriday or saturday.
It seems pretty obvious to me that it's action figures since there are round things near the feet.

They have a base it looks like, so I think figurines or something. There is also almost no way it is an update, in my opinion, is because .22 was almost just released and christmas is coming up, so I think that they would release around there, possibly including some christmas "Bonuses" like they did with Eeloo. Also, unless the devs lied to us, they would be releasing a "half-done" update. Lastly, I don't see how those relate to an update. I would love the update now, though!

Edited November 29, 2013 by minimuffin

Edited November 29, 2013 by RocketTurtle
When you look at the feet it seems they have some kinda base there that reminds me of the bases on a Warhammer miniature. Maybe they are miniatures?

Not a big fan of merchandising.

Especially the purely aesthetic kind. I might go for a mug or a shirt but not for action figurines.

Still its nice to see and i reckon me and my opinion are the minority here so good work.

That is, IF those things are actually Kerbal figurines.

Seriously? Does nobody understand how to click links?

Erm, I mean... a link was posted above... go ahead and do yourself a favor by clicking it... Better Kasper?

Here. http://www.shapeways.com/shops/kerbalspaceprogram

So far we have the one in the middle and the one to his right... I really want that Kerbal engineer!

Edited November 29, 2013 by RocketTurtle

Hey hey, keep it nice RocketTurtle

Squad just released two more figurines of stargazing Kerbals

Oh, and Kasper, do you have any info on Kerbal plushies?

And cheaper prints...
That's a shame I was hoping for an update or something like that... Not really interested in anything like that...
Oh cool they released the mechanic! And Duna!

Oh, and Kasper, do you have any info on Kerbal plushies?

I'll never tell

BREAKING NEWS: Kerbins south pole disappears!

Ohh!! I want Wherner Von Kerman! I can see his silhouette on the far left.

And lol The Destroyer.

Oh, and Kasper, you may want to put the Shapeways site on the OP so people don't come in going "OMG IT'S THE NEW UPDATE LOL WAT IS IT LOL WHERE DO I GET IT WHEN????"

Okay, fine, the KSP forums are more civilized then that, but, still.
